message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product of exceptional value. I believe it will greatly benefit you. I'm asking for $1,300,000 for this unique item.  Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits you'll gain.

I understand that the product has significant value, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,050,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll receive from the product.
